trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around September 5th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching opening night of the NFL football game and in start of the 3rd quarter I happen to catch a light shooting thru the sky. My friends and I decided to go back and take a better look. On my DVR in slow-mo you could make out a saucer looking shape moving at incredible speed. On pause its amazing. not sure if this is something CBS does to cause a stir but alot of ppl must have this on the dvr also. I will attach a clip i took from my iphone taken of my tv.
Summary: UFO over Mile High Stadium. Have On my DVR (Slow-Mo) Incredible
